title: Madurai of the Naiks
creator_credit: Documentary Films of India, Jehangir Bhownagary and Jagat Murari
brief_description: The Hindu shrines in Madurai, built in the 16th to 18th centuries by the Naik rulers. The Hindu mythology recounted in the multitudinous carvings and frescoes in the temple halls.
creator_credit_for_label: Documentary Films of India, Jehangir Bhownagary and Jagat Murari
